name: BottleCheck
0:
”Alexa, Open Bottle Check”
”Alexa, ask Bottle Check what's the level of my barbeque grill.”
”Alexa, ask Bottle Check what sensors do I have?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bottle check
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Bottle Check Gateway, customers can access their Bottle Check devices using Alexa commands.
Requires one or more Bottle Check sensors.
Requires registering an account with Amazon and an account within the Bottle Check App.
